channel.title: Esp-Hosted on Developer Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Esp-Hosted on Developer Portal

item.title: Transparent Wi-Fi connectivity for non-Wi-Fi ESP32 chips
item.description: This blog post introduces the esp-wifi-remote component, which extends Wi-Fi functionality to ESP32 chips that lack native Wi-Fi support. We will explore the esp-wifi-remote ecosystem, its components, architecture, and integration with esp-hosted.
